QueryResult.text: SELECT OWNER_FIRST_NAME, OWNER_LAST_NAME, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ASSOC_OBJ_ID, CREATOR_ID, OWNER_GROUP_ID, MIME_TYPE, FILE_TYPE, LOCK_OWNER_ID, LOCK_OWNER_FIRST_NAME, LOCK_OWNER_LAST_NAME, LOCK_OWNER_NAME, LOCK_TIME_STAMP, VERSIONING_ENABLED, NUM_CHECKOUT_DAYS, PARENT_FOLDER_ID, FILE_CREATED_DATE, PARENT_FOLDER_PATH, PARENT_FOLDER_TYPE, AREA_ID, IS_LATEST, VERSION_NUMBER, BYTE_SIZE, CHECK_IN_COMMENT, FILE_ID, MODIFIED_DATE, USER_ID, SUM(PERMISSION_VALUE) PERMISSION_VALUE , WORKFLOW_ID, PARENT_FOLDER_NAME, VERSION_ID, STATUS FROM CLB_DMS_FILES_INST_R_V0 GROUP BY OWNER_FIRST_NAME, OWNER_LAST_NAME, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ASSOC_OBJ_ID, CREATOR_ID, OWNER_GROUP_ID, MIME_TYPE, FILE_TYPE, LOCK_OWNER_ID, LOCK_OWNER_FIRST_NAME, LOCK_OWNER_LAST_NAME, LOCK_OWNER_NAME, LOCK_TIME_STAMP, VERSIONING_ENABLED, NUM_CHECKOUT_DAYS, PARENT_FOLDER_ID, FILE_CREATED_DATE, PARENT_FOLDER_PATH, PARENT_FOLDER_TYPE, AREA_ID, IS_LATEST, VERSION_NUMBER, BYTE_SIZE, CHECK_IN_COMMENT, FILE_ID, MODIFIED_DATE, USER_ID, WORKFLOW_ID, PARENT_FOLDER_NAME, VERSION_ID, STATUS
